mean_cn: adj.降伏的，沮丧的，衰竭的，俯卧的（读作/ˈprɑsˌtreɪt/）；  v.弄倒，使屈服（读作/prɑ:'streɪt/）
mean_en: lying with the front of your body turned toward the ground
sentence: He lay prostrate on the ground, not daring to look up at the emperor.
sentence_trans: 他伏在地上，不敢仰视皇帝。
word_etyma: pro前 ＋ strat层次 ＋ e → 前[后]回一贯层次上 → prostrate俯卧；使沮丧
